 · Mapsforge (OSM-rendering)
 · The Noun Project (basis for attribute icons)
 · The Apache Commons Project
 · Android Icons (CC-BY 3.0)
 · RRZE Icon set (CC-BY-SA 3.0)

Next release

 New Features/Functions:
 · Log images can be scaled before upload to save traffic · Improved online detection when refreshing caches
 · Talking compass (accessible in compass menu)
 
 Bugfixing:
 · Do not apply encryption/decryption when clicking on a link in a log
 · Also show a picture attached to a log locally after sending the log
 · Improved display of log text for OC-caches
 · GPX import option now also shown on all caches list
 · OC.de attributes correction
 · Reduce memory usage for images to avoid crashes
 · Do not show short description if it is contained in long description for OC.de caches
 · Do not allow setting the GPX dir to a not accessible directory
 · Failure in waypoint projection for some languages corrected
 · Ask for saving the cache if personal note is edited
 · Automatically select the matching log type for event caches
 · Removed links to help app (it is not maintained by c:geo team and not working on some Android versions)
 
 Detailed list of all changes
 
 Known Limitations/Bugs:
 · Live map:
 Approximated coords due to limitations on the GC-website
 Be aware: If navigation is started directly from live map it may also use the approximated coords!
 In fast mode the cache type might be wrong in rare cases
 On low zoom owned/found caches may not be hidden anymore
 · Other:
 The personal note added to a cache is not synced to geocaching.com but will be overruled by personal notes on geocaching.com
 On devices with HD display resolution OSM maps might not work. Please use Google maps in this case.
 Old releases
 · Please refer to the release notes on the c:geo-website.
